scripts.prisma: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma npx prisma
scripts.migrate: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma npx prisma migrate dev --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.reset: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma npx prisma migrate reset --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.studio: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma npx prisma studio --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma
